original: We pay §Y$VAL$%§! of our income in tariffs to $MOTHER$, and if the tariffs are higher than our Liberty Desire, then the Liberty Desire increases by §G+$INC$%§! each year.
translation: 我们将收入中的 §Y$VAL$%§! 作为关税支付给$MOTHER$。如果我们的独立倾向低于关税，则每年将提高 §G+$INC$%§!。

original: Liberty Desire represents the colony's desire for independence. Increasing tariffs among other things will increase it over time.
translation: 独立倾向代表殖民地追求独立的迫切程度。提高关税等事件会使其随着时间推移而增长。

original: Liberty Desire represents the country's desire for independence. They may turn rebellious if their Liberty Desire is over §Y$VAL$%§!
translation: 独立倾向代表国家追求独立的迫切程度，他们可能在独立倾向超过§Y$VAL$%§!时反叛。

original: Spend $POINTS|R$ $TYPE$ to increase the tariffs by $TARIFFS|%0G$ (currently worth $WORTH|Y$¤ monthly). This will also increase $COUNTRY|Y$ Liberty Desire by §R$LIBERTY|0$%§!.
translation: 消耗$POINTS|R$$TYPE$ 提高$TARIFFS|%0G$关税（当前每月值$WORTH|Y$¤），同时会使$COUNTRY|Y$的独立倾向增加§R$LIBERTY|0$%§!。

original: Spend $POINTS|R$ $TYPE$ to decrease the tariffs by $TARIFFS|%0R$ (currently worth $WORTH|Y$¤ monthly). This will decrease $COUNTRY|Y$ Liberty Desire by §G$LIBERTY|0$%§!.
translation: 消耗$POINTS|R$$TYPE$ 以降低$TARIFFS|%0R$关税（当前每月值$WORTH|Y$¤），同时会使$COUNTRY|Y$的独立倾向降低§G$LIBERTY|0$%§!。

original: Chance of inheriting on monarch death: $VAL|+%$
translation: 君主驾崩后能继任的几率：$VAL|+%$

original: Chance of union breaking on monarch death: $VAL|-%$
translation: 君主驾崩后联合统治破裂的几率：$VAL|-%$

original: Colonies pay a part (based on tariff efficiency) of their tax as tariff. This can be increased but may cause the colony to rebel.
translation: 殖民地将税收的一部分用作关税（基于关税效率）支付给我们。你能够增加此中比例，但可能导致殖民地的叛乱。

original: Your $TYPES$ are required to pay $VALUE|Y$ of their monthly tax to you.
translation: 你的$TYPES$被要求支付他们月入税收的$VALUE|Y$给你。

original: $TYPES$ do not give us any tax.
Disloyal subjects will refuse to pay us taxes and tariffs.
translation: 不忠的属国会拒绝上缴税收和关税。

original: Our subject has an army of §Y$NUM$§! regiments. Our army has §Y$LORD_NUM$§! regiments.
translation: 我们的属国有一支规模达§Y$NUM$§!个团的军队。我们的军队规模达§Y$LORD_NUM$§!个团。

original: A subject nation that has a greater army than its overlord will feel more inclined towards rebellion.
translation: 属国拥有比宗主国更强大的军队时会更倾向于掀起叛乱。

original: Gives the following amount of §YTrade power§! in listed nodes.
translation: 给以下列表中的贸易节点§YTrade power§!贸易竞争力。

original: Union will break if subject's opinion of his overlord is below §Y$LIMIT$§! (Current: $CURRENT$).
translation: 属国对其宗主的好感度低于§Y$LIMIT$§! （当前值：$CURRENT$）时，联合统治将破裂。

original: Union will break if overlords prestige is below §Y$LIMIT$§! (Current: $CURRENT$).
translation: 当宗主国的威望低于§Y$LIMIT$§!（当前值：$CURRENT$）时，联合统治将破裂。

original: You do not currently have any subject nations.
When migrating, $COUNTRY$ will lose control over $PROVINCE$. They will move on to a chosen neighboring province. $COUNTRY$ will also earn a boost in monarch power when migrating.
translation: 进行部落迁徙时$COUNTRY$会失去对$PROVINCE$的控制并迁徙到被选中的邻近省份。同时$COUNTRY$也会获得君主点数加成。

original: One or more tribes ruled by a council of hereditary positions. Its members present unanimous decisions after lengthy discussions, although one chieftain has the honor of being the official spokesperson.
translation: 一个或多个部落的首领组成的世袭式议会。成员们处理政务时必须经过长时间的讨论才能得出结果，然后一个酋长获得公开发布正式命令的荣誉。

original: You do not need specific access rights if you have close relations, or if you have the same overlord.
translation: 如果你和对方关系密切或臣服于同一领主，则不需要申请特定的通行权。

original: The overlord of a country's overlord does not need specific access rights.
translation: 属国宗主国的宗主国并不需要特别授予通行权。

original: You need to reform your government first.
translation: 你需要先进行政体改革。

original: You need to reform your religion first.
translation: 你需要先进行宗教改革。

original: Reform our religion and society by learning from §Y$WHO$§!, giving us §Y$LVL$§! technologies spread across the categories, while embracing $NUM|Y$ institutions.
translation: 向§Y$WHO$§!学习以改革我们的宗教和社会。这可以使我们在各领域中获得§Y$LVL$§!科技，并接纳$NUM|Y$个思潮。

original: It is possible to reform our religion and society if we have all the religious reforms and either border a European nation OR have a total of $NEEDED|Y$ technology levels.
translation: 如果我们完成了所有的宗教改革选项并与欧洲国家相邻，或是总科技水平达到$NEEDED|Y$级，就可以改革我们的宗教与社会。

original: Reform our religion and society by applying our technological understanding. This will change our government into a more modern type and give us institutions to help us.
translation: 通过应用我们对技术的理解来改革我们的国家，这将会使我们的政府更加现代化并且给予思潮来帮助我们。

original: Reform to §Y$GOV$§! by learning from §Y$WHO$§!, giving us §Y$LVL$§! technologies spread across the categories, while embracing $NUM|Y$ institutions.
translation: 向§Y$WHO$§!学习以将政府改革至§Y$GOV$§!。这可以使我们在各领域中获得§Y$LVL$§!科技，并接纳$NUM|Y$个思潮。

original: It is possible to reform away from a native council to a more advanced form of government if we have all native advancements and either border a European nation OR have a total of $NEEDED|Y$ technology levels.
translation: 若我们完成所有的原住民开化并且接壤欧洲国家，或者科技水平总共达到$NEEDED|Y$级时，我们有可能将原住民会议政体改革为另一个更为先进的政府体制。

original: Reform our nation by applying our technological understanding. This will change our government into a more modern type and allow us to Westernize.
translation: 通过应用我们对技术的理解来改革我们的国家，这将使我们的政府更加现代化，使我们能够西方化。
§R－需要全部的土著传统体制革新。§!\n

original: §R- We need a neighbor having embraced some Institution, with an adjacent core province. §!\n
translation: §R－我们需要一个已经接受了一些思潮的邻国，以及一个相邻的核心省份。 §!\n

original: A nation cannot own more than one province to be able to migrate.
translation: 一个部落国家拥有的省份数量不能超过一个，否则无法进行部落迁徙。

original: It's not possible to migrate when at war.
translation: 战争期间无法进行部落迁徙。

original: $COUNTRY$ will be able to migrate again in $DAYS|Y$ days. ($DATE|Y$)
Click to open the migration view.
translation: 点击打开迁徙部落窗口。

original: $COUNTRY$ will migrate to $NEWPROV$ and lose control over $OLDPROV$. $COUNTRY$ will get $ADM$£adm£, $DIP$£dip£ and $MIL$£mil£ for migrating. $COUNTRY$ will have to wait to $DATE$ until they can migrate again.
translation: $COUNTRY$将迁徙到$NEWPROV$并失去$OLDPROV$的控制权。$COUNTRY$会因迁徙获得$ADM$£adm£、$DIP$£dip£和$MIL$£mil£。$DATE$后$COUNTRY$才能再次进行迁徙。

original: It's now possible to migrate to a neighboring province.
translation: 现在能迁徙到一个相邻的省份。

original: §YYou can now pass a religious reform.§!
A higher Government Rank will grant us considerable benefits.
translation: 级别更高的政府可以提供诸多好处。

original: §YYou can now invest in a native advancement.§!
translation: §Y现在可以发展一项原住民开化。§!

original: §YYou will soon be dropped from the federation.§!
translation: §Y你很快就会被部落联盟开除。§!

original: $LIST$\nIf your federation leader gets a negative opinion about you, you'll be kicked out from the federation.
translation: $LIST$\n如果你的部落联盟盟主对你有不好的看法，你将会被踢出部落联盟。

original: §YOne or more of your subjects have a high Liberty Desire.§!
translation: §Y你的一个或多个属国独立倾向高。§!

original: $LIST$\nIf one of your subjects gets more than $LIMIT|Y0$ Liberty Desire, they will become disloyal and might declare an independence war.
translation: $LIST$\n若你属国独立倾向高于$LIMIT|Y0$，他们就会不忠于你并可能发动独立战争。

original: The Federation leader must have a positive opinion about a new member.
translation: 部落联盟盟主必须对新成员有积极的态度。

original: It is not possible to migrate to a province you haven't discovered yet.
translation: 无法迁徙至一个未被发现的省份。

original: You do not have any neighboring provinces that you can migrate to.
translation: 没有可迁徙的邻近省份。

original: It's not possible to migrate to wasteland.
It's not possible to migrate to a sea province.
When all $MAX|Y$ advancement groups are fully unlocked, you'll be able to change government type. $UNLOCKED|Y$ groups are filled so far.
translation: 当完全解锁所有$MAX|Y$个制度革新组便可以改变政体。目前已完全解锁$UNLOCKED|Y$个革新组。

original: Regions where colonial states and trade companies can form.
translation: 可以成立殖民地国家和贸易公司的地区。

original: $NAME$ is not a member of a federation.
The leader of a federation gets the following bonus:\n$BONUS$
translation: 部落联盟盟主获得以下加成：\n$BONUS$

original: Only a federation leader may invite to federation.
translation: 只有部落联盟盟主可以邀请加盟。

original: When the monarch of $LEADER|Y$ dies, the country with the highest federal authority will be the new leader. Right now that is $NEWLEADER|Y$ with $VAL|Y0$ federal authority.
translation: $LEADER|Y$统治者去世后，盟内权威最高的国家将成为新盟主。目前的人选是拥有$VAL|Y0$盟内权威的$NEWLEADER|Y$。

original: Do you wish to ask $ACTOR$ if you can join their Federation.
translation: 你想询问$ACTOR$你是否可以加入他们的部落联盟。

original: $ACTOR$ is requesting to join our federation. Do we accept their request?
translation: $ACTOR$在请求加入我们的部落联盟。我们是否接受他们的请求？
邀请加入一个部落联盟。

original: Do you wish to ask $ACTOR$ if they will join our Federation.
translation: 你想询问$ACTOR$他们是否要加入我们的联盟。

original: $ACTOR$ is asking us to join their Federation. Do we want to join?
translation: $ACTOR$邀请我们加入他们的部落联盟。我们要参加吗？

original: Do you wish to join the Federation of $LEADER$.
translation: 你希望加入$LEADER$组建的部落联盟。

original: Do you wish to invite $COUNTRY$ to your Federation.
translation: 你希望邀请$COUNTRY$加入你的部落联盟。
邀请加入你的部落联盟。

original: Ask if $COUNTRY$ may join the Federation led by $LEADER$.
translation: 询问$COUNTRY$是否能加入$LEADER$领导的部落联盟。

original: Ask if $THEY$ would like to join the Federation led by $LEADER$.
translation: 询问$THEY$是否加入$LEADER$领导的部落联盟。

original: $COUNTRY$ will leave the Federation led by $LEADER$.
$COUNTRY$ will be kicked out from the Federation led by $LEADER$.
translation: $COUNTRY$将被踢出由$LEADER$领导的部落联盟。

original: $COUNTRY$ need to be leader over a Federation to invite other countries.
translation: $COUNTRY$需要成为联盟的盟主才能邀请其他国家。

original: $COUNTRY$ need to be leader over a Federation to accept other countries.
translation: $COUNTRY$需要成为联盟的盟主才能接受其他国家的请求。

original: $COUNTRY$ is already in a Federation, led by $LEADER$.
translation: $COUNTRY$已经加入了由$LEADER$领导的部落联盟里。

original: A request to join must be sent to the leader for the Federation, $LEADER$.
translation: 加盟请求已经送达部落联盟盟主$LEADER$手中。

original: A request to leave a Federation must be sent to the leader, $LEADER$.
translation: 脱离请求已经送达部落联盟盟主$LEADER$手中。

original: Your goal is not to conquer and take their land, but to show them who the superior tribe is by humiliate their people.
translation: 你的目的不是政府并霸占他们的土地，而是给他们点教训，以此羞辱他们。

original: The goal is to force your enemy to admit defeat and be humiliated in the eyes of the world.
translation: 目标是迫使你的敌人承认失败，让它在全世界的注视下被羞辱。
我们可以羞辱我们的宿敌。

original: Cannot be used to take any provinces.
translation: 不能被用来夺取任何省份。

original: Your goal is to stop your enemies trade by blocking as many ports as possible.
translation: 你的目标是靠封锁尽量多的港口以破坏敌人的贸易。

original: Is NOT in the colonial region
At least one province in the $REGION$ colonial region
translation: 至少一个属于$REGION$殖民地区的省份

original: No provinces in the $REGION$ colonial region
translation: 没有一个属于$REGION$殖民地区的省份

original: All provinces in the $REGION$ colonial region
Not all provinces in the $REGION$ region
translation: 并非所有属于$REGION$殖民地区的省份

original: Is NOT a client state of
translation: 不是该国的自定义附庸：

original: This country is too backwards to become a proper vassal, they can only become a protectorate.
translation: 这个国家太过落后，不能成为附庸国，只能成为一个受保护国。

original: Our income from our vassals is modified by the following factors:\n
translation: 我们的附庸国上缴的收入受到以下因素影响：\n

original: Our income from our colonies is modified by the following factors:\n
translation: 我们的殖民领上缴的收入受到以下因素影响：\n

original: When a colonial nation forms from a nation's overseas provinces.
translation: 当一个国家的海外省份成立一个殖民地国家。

original: has formed from the overseas provinces of
The new nation is an independent possession of its mother country but may break free in the distant future if mismanaged.
translation: 这个新国家拥有独立于母国的行政地位，在遥远的未来里若缺乏管理可能会获得独立。
按转移的贸易竞争力排序

original: Sort by subjects opinion of us
The movement cost to adjacent sea provinces will decrease or increase depending on if you're sailing with or into the wind. This affects both trade range and colonial range.
translation: 信风的风向影响你在临海省份的移动消耗，同样也影响贸易范围以及殖民距离。

original: The beasts of the forest have been hunted, the berries picked and fish are scarce in the rivers. Nature needs time to recover.
translation: 兽狩尽，果啃逛，竭泽渔。自然需要时间来修复人类破坏的结果。

original: Release one of your colonial subjects
translation: 释放一个殖民领成为独立国家。

original: Should you wish, you can also continue playing as this nation.
translation: 如果你愿意，你也可以继续扮演这个国家。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§W will be released with the following provinces: $LIST$.\n
When a colonial is released from its former overlord.
translation: 当殖民领从之前的宗主国中解放。

original: has released the former colony of
The new nation is fully independent.
translation: 这个新生的国家将是一个完全独立的国家。

original: Liberty Desire must be over $LIMIT|Y$, current Liberty Desire is $CURRENT|Y$
translation: 独立倾向必须超过$LIMIT|Y$，目前为$CURRENT|Y$

original: Not possible to release colonies while at war.
translation: 无法在战争中解放殖民领。
§Y当前独立倾向给我们带来的影响：§W

original: This relation can be improved by $OPINION|+$ more, estimated to be done $DATE|Y$.
translation: 这段关系能够再提升$OPINION|+$，预计于$DATE|Y$完成。

original: One or more tribes ruled by a council of hereditary positions. Its members present unanimous decisions after lengthy discussions, although one chieftain has the honor of being the official spokesperson.
translation: 一个或多个部落的首领组成的世袭式议会。成员们处理政务时必须经过长时间的讨论才能得出结果,然后由名义上的酋长公开发布正式命令。
